channel.title: Fix to Gauntlet Calendar
channel.description:
We've applied fix to the notifications from the Gauntlet Calendar. As always, players receive an email when they sign up for a game. Now GMs should once again also receive email notifications when someone signs up for their event. They should also get an email when someone moves from the waitlist to the actual event. Now when a player moves from the waitlist to the event, they should also get an email.
Keep an eye on this and tell me if this doesn't work for you.

item.title: Fix to Gauntlet Calendar
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

We’ve applied fix to the notifications from the Gauntlet Calendar. As always, players receive an email when they sign up for a game. Now GMs should once again also receive email notifications when someone signs up for their event. They should also get an email when someone moves from the waitlist to the actual event. Now when a player moves from the waitlist to the event, they should also get an email.

Keep an eye on this and tell me if this doesn’t work for you.
